data.actual_result: Entry is written as "Set the guild verification level to {Level}"
data.expected_result: Entry is written as "Set the server verification level to {level}"
data.short_description: Audit Log entry for Verification Level changes incorrectly says "Guild" instead of "Server"
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server - Go into its Server Settings -> Moderation - Set the Verification Level to either Low, High, or Very High - Go into the Audit Logs and extend the entry for the Verification Level change you just did and observe the text
